reviewText: I purchased this dvd to have for myself and also for my two young boys.  Being born and raised in the Bronx, it's hard to explain to people and family about what I saw in the days I was growing up.  Graffitti, breakdancing, and  Hip hop music, all reaching it's peak in the same era was a culture within a culture that has taken the world by storm and still going strong.  Artist like the TATS CRU are some of the great artist that are keeping the art form alive and pure.
